tags.name: granite-qrcode-decoder
tags.description: A custom element to decode a QR Code from an image.

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: The data to encode in the QRCode.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: If true, the QRCode is regenerated at each change in parameters.

attributes.name: debug
attributes.description: If debug is true, the components logs its actions on the console.

attributes.name: ecclevel
attributes.description: The error correction code level, one of 'L', 'M', 'Q', 'H'. Defaults to 'L'.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: The format of the generated QRCode, either "html" or "png". Defaults to "png".

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: The mode of the QRCode, one of 'numeric', 'alphanumeric', 'octet'. When omitted the smallest possible ('numeric') mode is chosen.

attributes.name: margin
attributes.description: This is a size of margin in *modules*. Defaults to 4 (white modules). The specficiation mandates the margin no less than 4 modules

attributes.name: mask
attributes.description: The mask level, an integer in [0,7]. When omitted (or -1) the best mask is chosen.

attributes.name: modulesize
attributes.description: The size of each modules in pixels. Defaults to 5px.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: The QRCode version, an integer in [1,40]. When omitted (or -1) the smallest possible version is chosen.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data to encode in the QRCode.

properties.name: auto
properties.description: If true, the QRCode is regenerated at each change in parameters.

properties.name: debug
properties.description: If debug is true, the components logs its actions on the console.

properties.name: ecclevel
properties.description: The error correction code level, one of 'L', 'M', 'Q', 'H'. Defaults to 'L'.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The format of the generated QRCode, either "html" or "png". Defaults to "png".

properties.name: mode
properties.description: The mode of the QRCode, one of 'numeric', 'alphanumeric', 'octet'. When omitted the smallest possible ('numeric') mode is chosen.

properties.name: margin
properties.description: This is a size of margin in *modules*. Defaults to 4 (white modules). The specficiation mandates the margin no less than 4 modules

properties.name: mask
properties.description: The mask level, an integer in [0,7]. When omitted (or -1) the best mask is chosen.

properties.name: modulesize
properties.description: The size of each modules in pixels. Defaults to 5px.

properties.name: version
properties.description: The QRCode version, an integer in [1,40]. When omitted (or -1) the smallest possible version is chosen.

events.name: qrcode-generated
events.description: Fires whenever a QRcode is generated.
